keywords.DESCRIPTION: Has additional effects that activate if you have sufficient #ySakura or #yButterfly stacks.
A resource gained by defeating an #Elite, used with certain #yrelics. Has a maximum of #b6 stacks.
#yPhantasm is used to calculate the effects of various cards. Its value is equal to the total sum of your #ySakura and #yButterfly stacks.
A resource used with #yAetherial cards, gained by having the first card you play in a turn be an #yAttack.
A resource used with #yAetherial cards, gained by having the first card you play in a turn be a #ySkill.
Reduces damage dealt by #b2 for every #b2 stacks, up to a maximum of #b5 less damage. When an enemy with #yMoribund dies, you heal up to #5 HP.
If exhausted, put a random card from your exhaust pile into your hand. That card gains #yEthereal for the rest of combat.
Whenever you play this card, shuffle the next card in the sequence into your draw pile.
After playing this card, immediately end your turn.
This card's effects can be triggered by either playing it or manually discarding it from your hand.
Any enemy that is not a #bminion, #yelite, or #rboss.
